document_data.name: Embrus Obarskyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Embrus "the Old"''' was so named because he was the ripe age of 49 when he took the throne as the sixth [[Obarskyr]] monarch of Cormyr after the death of his younger brother [[Rhiiman the Glorious]] in 79 DR. Although he was the second son of [[Faerlthann Obarskyr|King Faerlthann]], his father declared him to be last in the line of succession.
document_data.Relationships: Embrus had two sons, [[Kaspler Obarskyr|Kaspler]] and [[Imbre Obarskyr|Imbre]], both born before his coronation, ensuring the continuation of his line in the wake of three consecutive heir-less kings.
